All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Cell
Object of this class represent a Cell of 2048 boards number
CreateUserMenu
Object of this class represent the menu of the application where the user can create an account by username
EndGame
Object of this class represent the end game menu of the application
GameplayMenu
Object of this class represent the gameplay menu, a single menu that shows up which user can choose what level of the game that the user want to play.
GameScene
Object of this class represent the view of 2048 game and all the game logic of the 2048 game.
LeaderBoard
Object of this class represent a leaderboard menu which show the history of the game played by the users.
Main
This is the Main class of the application.
MainMenu
The object of this class represent the main menu of the game.
TextMaker
The object of this class is responsible to create a javafx text object.
Theme
The object of this class is responsible for manipulating the theme information of the application such as the background color and the color of the 2048 board.
ThemeController
The object of this class is responsible to maintain and change the state of the application theme.
UserAccount
The object of this class represent a single instance of the user account (player) which hold the details of a record of user account, score, and the level of the game that the user play.
UserListAccount
The object of this class is responsible to maintain the information of the current player (user) and store the user gameplay result to the text file.
